Name: Konstantinos Margaritis
AboutMe:
Holding a BSc(Hons) in Computer Science and an MSc(Distinction) in Software Engineering from the University of Sheffield. Extensive experience from parallel and distributed systems in diverse projects, with high understanding of scalable architectures. Strong background in software testing and system integrations.

Hard worker, and a highly skilled problem solver who is passionate about new technologies, APIs integrations, new frameworks and programming languages. Expertised in engineering code of high quality, well documented, that performs fast and keeps complexity within standards. Contributor in open source libraries and an aficionado in providing top notch software.

Believe in teamwork and always invest in people.
